Docs.summary: Represents the schema of an enumeration property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class inherits the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.Default%2A> property from the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> class, which has no meaning for this class. Use the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue.IsDefault%2A> property on the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue> instead to mark the default value for this property.
